section.title: Preferences
section.para: The environment setting of Anyframe Query Manager is done through the Eclipse Preferences window. The prefix and suffix defined during environment setting is used to execute Content Assist for the DAO of the Anyframe Query Manager that inherited AbstractDAO.

The information saved through environment setting should apply contents that customized prefix and suffix of Query or VO (Value Object), etc. defined in AbstractDAO in a specific development environment. For your information, "customization of prefix and suffix" is done through bean setting of AbstractDAO, and the user can apply related contents through the environment setting window of Anyframe Query Manager without modifying other codes.
